column2: The GVA in bristol in billions and its percentage change.

GVA is a prodictivity metric that provides a dollar value for the amount of goods and services that have been produced in a country (or local authority), minus the cost of all inputs and raw materials that are directly attributable to that production
No calculations were performed on this dataset and it is presented as found
